name: xibo
tagline: A digital signage CMS for managing displays
description: Xibo is a self-hosted digital signage platform for designing, scheduling, and delivering content to remote displays. It provides a CMS web UI and various players to run media on screens in organizations.

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Control hundreds of remote displays from a single web interface with grouping and tagging

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Organize images, videos, and documents in a centralized library with version control and metadata

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Deploy content to Windows, Android, Linux, and web-based players with automatic synchronization

features.title: Proof Of Play
features.description: Track what content played on which displays and when for compliance and reporting

features.title: Access Control
features.description: Define granular access controls for content creators, schedulers, and administrators
